categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Corrdair was a battle fought between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire at Corrdair during the Galactic Civil War at some point before or in 1 BBY. The Imperials sent All Terrain Missile Platforms to attack Major Limm Nix and the rest of the Alliance forces that were stationed there.

The Battle of Corrdair was first mentioned in the "AT-MP (All Terrain Missile Platform)" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of LucasArts' video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released in 2020.
